events.name: eds-system-notification-icon-close-clicked
events.description: fired on click event of close icon

properties.name: collapsedActionText
properties.description: set text in the aria-label tag when the banner queue is collapsed

properties.name: composeDescription
properties.description: array of descriptions to be composed when useComposed is true

properties.name: counter
properties.description: Display the number of notifications in notification banner queue.

properties.name: descriptionText
properties.description: label for description text

properties.name: displayShadow
properties.description: boolean to display a dropshadow around the notification

properties.name: expandedActionText
properties.description: set text in the aria-label tag when the banner queue is expanded

properties.name: headingText
properties.description: label for the heading

properties.name: hideCloseIcon
properties.description: boolean to hide close icon

properties.name: isExpanded
properties.description: Handle the collapsible icon orientation and its state in notification banner queue

properties.name: isLoading
properties.description: boolean to show the loading indicator

properties.name: isNotificationBannerQueueEnabled
properties.description: Allows to activate all the elements for a notification banner queue

properties.name: isNotificationQueueEnabled
properties.description: if notification is inside a notification queue

properties.name: isStacked
properties.description: boolean to signify that a notification is being stacked on other notifications

properties.name: isStatic
properties.description: boolean option to prevent self-deletion from the DOM when true.

properties.name: layout
properties.description:
type of layout (multi/single/skinny-header/skinny-content).  Heading and Description are in multiple lines. Or in a single line.
skinny-header would render only header, while skinny-content would render only body content.
Nevertheless, when `isNotificationBannerQueueEnabled` is enabled, layout property will be set in single line promptly.

properties.name: secondaryText
properties.description: label for secondary text. will only render if descriptionText is included

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: An amount of time, in seconds, to display the system notification before it disappears

properties.name: topmost
properties.description: boolean to optionally set system notification a high z-index

properties.name: type
properties.description:
types of system-notification:
- success
- success-acknowledged
- info-general
- info-acknowledged
- info-highlighted-option-1
- info-highlighted-option-2
- info-highlighted-option-3
- low-severity-primary
- low-severity-alternate
- low-severity-acknowledged
- moderate-severity-primary
- moderate-severity-alternate
- moderate-severity-acknowledged
- high-severity-primary
- high-severity-alternate
- high-severity-acknowledged

properties.name: useComposed
properties.description: boolean to specify that notification description will be composed.

EDSSystemNotification.description: The **system notification** is a visual bar that provides clear and relevant system feedback to the user of a change in state or status as they use products and services. The system notification is intended to appear in context of the change or status. It can be applied at the page or a component level.
EDSSystemNotification.name: System Notification
EDSSystemNotification.usage:
```html
<eds-system-notification type="info-general" heading-text="Notification Headline" description-text="Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non da prodient, sunt in culpa qui officia" secondary-text="Metadata | Lorem ipsum">
</eds-system-notification>
```
* System-notification component has 2 named slots that you can use: heading-utilities, description-utilities
`heading-utilities` slot can be used to integrate buttons into the heading of the system-notification
`description-utilites` slot can be used to integrate buttons into the description portion of the system-notification

The following CSS variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-system-notification-info-general-background-color | Background color for information general
--eds-system-notification-info-general-text-color | Text color for information general
--eds-system-notification-info-general-border-color | Border color for information general
--eds-system-notification-info-acknowledged-background-color | Background color information acknowledged
--eds-system-notification-info-acknowledged-border-color | Border color information acknowledged
--eds-system-notification-info-general-highlighted-option-1-background-color | Background color for information general highlighted option 1
--eds-system-notification-info-general-highlighted-option-1-border-color | Border color for information general highlighted option 1
--eds-system-notification-info-highlighted-option-2-background-color | Background color for information general highlighted option 2
--eds-system-notification-info-highlighted-option-2-border-color | Border color for information general highlighted option 2
--eds-system-notification-info-highlighted-option-3-background-color | Background color for information general highlighted option 3
--eds-system-notification-info-highlighted-option-3-border-color | Border color for information general highlighted option 3
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-primary-background-color | Background color for high severity primary
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-alt-background-color | Background color for high severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-acknowledged-background-color | Background color for high severity acknowledged
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-primary-border-color | Border color for high severity primary
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-alt-border-color | Border color for high severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-acknowledged-border-color | Border color for high severity acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-primary-exclamation-mark-color | Exclamation mark color for icon in high severity
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-primary-text-color | Text color high-severity
--eds-system-notification-high-severity-acknowledged-icon-color | Icon color for high severity acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-primary-background-color | Background color for moderate severity primary
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-alt-background-color | Background color for moderate severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-acknowledged-background-color | Background color for moderate severity acknowledged
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-primary-border-color | Border color for moderate severity primary
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-alt-border-color | Border color for moderate severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-acknowledged-border-color | Border color for moderate severity acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-moderate-severity-acknowledged-icon-color | Icon color for moderate severity acknowledge icon
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-primary-background-color | Background color for low severity primary
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-alt-background-color | Background color for low severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-acknowledged-background-color | Background color for low severity acknowledged
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-primary-border-color | Border color for low severity primary
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-alt-border-color | Border color for low severity alternate
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-acknowledged-border-color | Border color for low severity acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-low-severity-acknowledged-icon-color | Icon color for low severity acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-success-background-color | Background color for success
--eds-system-notification-success-border-color | Border color for success
--eds-system-notification-success-acknowledged-background-color | Background color for success acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-success-acknowledged-border-color | Border color for success acknowledge
--eds-system-notification-text-color | Text color
--eds-system-notification-acknowledged-text-color | Acknowledged text color

events.name: eds-system-notification-icon-close-clicked
